definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
the dead cannot testify (idiom); dead men tell no tales

sentences.english: The present research about Zheng has been analyzed by the authors.
sentences.chinese: 作者對證本質研究的現狀作了分析。

sentences.english: Zhang's prescription, as long as it is at the heart medication.
sentences.chinese: 張仲景的方子，只要是對證用藥。

sentences.english: Face to face the truth comes out.
Face and face truth comes out.
